name: duplicate-line-remover
title: Duplicate Line Remover
description: Remove duplicate lines from text files while preserving order
content:
Overview

This application removes duplicate lines from text files, keeping only the first occurrence of each unique line.

Features

  • Remove duplicate lines efficiently
  • Case-sensitive or case-insensitive comparison
  • Preserve original line order
  • Keep first occurrence of duplicates

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your text file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a cleaned text file with the suffix '_unique.txt' in the specified output directory.
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/duplicate_line_remover.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
